Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItemACLKeysLevel1Match
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available in first level of the ITSM Config Item ACL structure.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItemACLKeysLevel1Change
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available in first level of the ITSM Config Item ACL structure.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItemACLKeysLevel2::Possible
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available in second level of the ITSM Config Item ACL structure.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItemACLKeysLevel2::PossibleAdd
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available in second level of the ITSM Config Item ACL structure.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItemACLKeysLevel2::PossibleNot
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available in second level of the ITSM Config Item ACL structure.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItemACLKeysLevel2::Properties
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available in second level of the ITSM Config Item ACL structure.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItemACLKeysLevel2::PropertiesDatabase
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available in second level of the ITSM Config Item ACL structure.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItemACLKeysLevel3::Actions###100-Default
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available for 'Action' in third level of the ITSM Config Item ACL structure.

Setting.Name: ConfigItemACL::ACLPreselection
Setting.Description: Whether the execution of ConfigItemACL can be avoided by checking cached field dependencies. This can improve loading times of formulars, but has to be disabled, if ACLModules are to be used for ITSMConfigItem- and Form-ReturnTypes.

Setting.Name: ConfigItemACL::Autoselect
Setting.Description: Whether fields should be automatically filled (1), and in that case also be hidden from ticket formulars (2).
